price: Onlardan (azap) hafifletilmeyecek ve orada onlar ümitlerini kaybetmiş kimselerdir.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
